TextBody:
Hello Dave,

I will ask internally if we have the release notes for the EPP Client and I will forward them to you tomorrow.

Best regards,
Emil
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CZDTK:ref
Subject: Client Upgrade Release notes    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CZDTK:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CZDTK:ref

Thankyou, I'm due before an emergency CAB meeting at 3pm and need to create the change and present findings, should there be a need to upgrade.  CVE-2024-36075 is the one that may be client related I need to verify
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #413746 - Client Upgrade Release notes

TextBody:
Hello Dave,

I'm sorry, but don't have yet the release notes for the EPP Client.
The EPP Clients are going to be treated separately. So there will be another patch which will add the new EPP Clients to the server.

I will get back to you with an update as soon as I will have some news.

Best regards,
Emil
